name: Gray (Fitz)
description: Meet Gray - an unbearably cute and insanely smart alien. Follow his unfortunate excursion to Planet Earth. Help him conquer Earth. "Gray" is a retro adventure game -- a classic point&clicker with 320x240 graphics in 4C (four colors!), with mesmerizing original soundtrack, lots of crazy dialogues, informative monologues, ridiculous riddles, snide humor, useless trivia, occasional vandalism and good ol' pixel hunting.
